Care3 | Los Angeles | Senior Fullstack Engineer & Fullstack Engineer & | Full-time, Onsite | care3.co/careers.php

Care3 started with the realization that the most vulnerable members of our society including seniors, people of color, and the disabled do not have equal access to healthcare and receive woefully inadequate quality of care in their homes and communities. Care3 is built to fix these unacceptable and unnecessary disparities.

We've created a collaboration tool that allows care givers and care teams to coordinate care for the patient. We're looking to grow our platform and keep evolving in ways that impact our customers positively.

Care3 is looking for talented people who are okay about not knowing how to solve a problem and figure it out anyways. We provide the environment to allow you to make mistakes, and for you own it and fix it because we know things break. The impact of your contributions will be immediate and we're excited to add to our team!

You can apply by sending your resume to careers@care3.co, thanks!
